recipe.title: Bea Arthur's Vegetarian Breakfast
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°. Melt the margarine in a small sauté pan over medium heat. Add the tomatoes and mushrooms, and sauté until soft, about 4 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put some tomato-mushroom mixture on each piece of toast. Heat in the oven for 2 minutes before serving.
